column4: Ok then.. are there any other cd/dvd burning packages other than K3b that I can try?  I need something that will recognize and burn various image types, as well as write VIDEO_TS dvd folders, etc... I can't get K3b to work and nobody here seems willing to help :(
odd that you are having k3b issues - it works great for me.
run it from a terminal and see if any error messages are being printed.
